did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: International Council for Adult Education (ICAE) Records
did.abstract: The International Council for Adult Education (ICAE) is an organization whose focus is to support and facilitate adult education programs worldwide. Records include reports, an agenda, a directory and a photograph.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: Established in 1973, the International Council for Adult Education (ICAE) is a global partnership of adult learners and adult educators and their organizations, and others who promote the use of adult learning as a tool for informed participation of people and sustainable development. In the emergence of knowledge-society the ICAE promotes lifelong learning as a necessary component for people to contribute creatively to their communities and live in independent and democratic societies. (Taken from ICAE website, 5 Jun 2006)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The International Council for Adult Education (ICAE) Records consists of reports, an agenda, a directory and a photograph. Materials are arranged chronologically, with the exception of the photograph which is at the end.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: The library holds a considerable number of collections related to adult and continuing education. Please refer to &subjindex; for a complete listing.
In particular, see the Alexander N. Charters Papers and the Coalition of Adult Education Organizations (CAEO) Records.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed offsite and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

International Council for Adult Education (ICAE) Records,
&su_name;
